branchCategory.name: IDF*F Refrigerated Air Dryer, Size 100~150, Standard Inlet Air Temperature
branchCategory.description: <p>Series IDF*F refrigerated air dryers are larger units with improved ambient (113&deg;F/45&deg;C) and inlet (140&deg;F/60&deg;C) air temperatures.</p>
